roles.title: Software Engineering Intern
roles.blurb: Maintained and extended CS50's open-source libraries (check50, submit50, compare50, render50, lib50), used by over 5 million students and educators.

roles.title: Teaching Fellow [CS50] @ Harvard College
roles.blurb: Lectured 15+ students on Computer Science basics and guided them in C, Python, SQL, HTML/CSS/Javascript, and Flask.

roles.title: Teaching Fellow [CS50 (and AI) for Lawyers] @ Harvard Law School
roles.blurb: Assisted in lectures and hosted office hours on the intersection of Computer Science and Law, focusing on Python, SQL, web development, and AI technologies.

roles.title: Teaching Fellow [CS50] @ Harvard College
roles.blurb: Lectured 15+ students on Computer Science basics and guided them in C, Python, SQL, HTML/CSS/Javascript, and Flask.

roles.title: Director
roles.blurb: Lead Harvard's premier flagship hackathon (3,000+ applicants, 1,200 accepted), guiding five teams across Tech, Logistics, Finance, Marketing, and Hacker Experience.

roles.title: Tech Team Member
roles.blurb: Assisted in technical direction and infrastructure for HackHarvard 2024, including website development, submission platform, and internal tools used by thousands.

roles.title: Algo Team Lead
roles.blurb: Co-led the algorithm team for Datamatch, a matchmaking service for over 16,000+ students nationwide, debugging and optimizing legacy C++ code to generate results on a deadline.

roles.title: Algo Team Member
roles.blurb: Maintained and improved internal utilities for Datamatch, attending weekly meetings and seminars on algorithm design and data structures.
